members.member:

Return the name of the current FTP server.
Server name

Set the port number to use for FTP.

The current remote directory path.

Set the user name to use for logging into the remote server.

Return a string array containing the remote directory's file list.
Return the size of a file.
Login to the remote server.
If the value of mode is true, set binary mode for downloads. Else, set Ascii mode.
Download a file to the Assembly's local directory, keeping the same file name.
Download a remote file to the Assembly's local directory, keeping the same file name, and set the resume flag.
Download a remote file to a local file name which can include a path. The local file name will be created or overwritten, but the path must exist.
Download a remote file to a local file name which can include a path, and set the resume flag. The local file name will be created or overwritten, but the path must exist.
Upload a file.
Upload a file and set the resume flag.
Delete a file from the remote FTP server.
Rename a file on the remote FTP server.
Create a directory on the remote FTP server.
Delete a directory on the remote FTP server.
Change the current working directory on the remote FTP server.
Close the FTP connection.
Set debug mode.

member.name: T:BibPlanMaker.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:BibPlanMaker.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:BibPlanMaker.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
